release.action: Optionally add final to equals and compareTo. (requested by Archimedes Trajano)
Added the osgi bundle to the plugin jar (was missing in the build script). This allows the plugin to be activated without restarting eclipse after installation.
Reorganized preference page for better readability.
Updated to use the new Eclipse 3.0 API. This version requires Eclipse 3 and will not run on the 2.x series
Generated methods are now properly formatted according user preferences (using the new Eclipse 3 formatter)
You can now use wildcards in excluded fields list. (requested by Ludovic Bailly)
New option to add an instance equality check to equals() methods (requested by Jay Glanville)
Don't add methods to read only files (previously it ignored file state for right clicks in the editor).
Boolean javabean properties are now properly included in toString()
Commonclipse preference page is now placed in the "Java" category.
Multiple types in the same .java file are handled on editor actions: you can now select inner or non-primary classes in java files.
Better check for valid custom ToStringStyle in preferences.
Plugin dependencies updated for Eclipse 3.0 M6.
Added Eclipse update site for automatic installation.
